News.Title: Silgo Retail Secures ₹172 Crore Solar Power Contract Under PM-KUSUM Scheme
News.Summary: Silgo Retail has received a contract for 48.5 MW solar power plants valued at ₹172 crores under the PM-KUSUM Scheme. The contract includes 25-year operations and maintenance services with tariffs set at ₹3.03 and ₹2.60 per unit.
